Our Offerings
Our offerings range from leading support and consultancy services to tailored made educational activities based on your organization’s needs.

.NET enrichment lectures

Tikal's .NET group enrichment lectures are Free. You can either join our local public lectures at "Fullstack Developers Israel" meetup group, or host a lecture at your offices to enrich your colleagues and team members. 
​This offering os available for Israeli local business only.

TypeScript introduction

TypeScript is a language for application-scale JavaScript development.

TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript. Any browser. Any host. Any OS. Open Source. 

In this session we will cover the following topics (including code samples) :
  • TypeScript language overview
  • Setup an environment, VisualStudio integration, debugging.
  • Using TypeScript with existing JavaScript libraries.
  • Migration pass - start using TypeScript with existing web app. Porting existing JavaScript to TypeScript
Time Frame : 50 min. 
Lecturer : Igor Zelmanovich - Tikal's .NET group leader.
Price : F.O.C.

The Reactive Extensions (Rx)

The Reactive Extensions is a library to compose asynchronous and event-based programs using observable collections and LINQ-style query operators. Build for .Net (WPF, SilverLight, WinRT) and JavaScript.

In this talk we will present the basic fundamental for using RX and how it can scale your work in everyday situations from UI composition to communication infrastructure.
 
The presentation is a walkthrough of code samples and insights.
 
Time Frame : 50 min. 
Lecturer : Menny Rachmanny - Tikal's .NET group leader.
Price : F.O.C.

 

WCF Abstraction

In this presentation we will review code samples while covering the following topics:

  1. WCF Introduction
  2. Abstraction of WCF layer for a self-hosted server with multiple clients
  3. Behaviors and intersection points
  4. Dependency Injection (DI)
  5. Security
  6. Best practice
You will get a full startup project working
 
Time Frame : 50 min. 
Lecturer : Menny Rachmanny - Tikal's .NET group leader.
Price : F.O.C.
